title: Massacre
extract:
A massacre is a killing, typically of multiple victims, considered morally unacceptable, especially when 
perpetrated by a group of political actors against defenseless victims.
The word is a loan of a French term for "butchery" or "carnage".
extract_html: A massacre is a killing, typically of multiple victims, considered morally unacceptable, especially when perpetrated by a group of political actors against defenseless victims. The word is a loan of a French term for "butchery" or "carnage".
